content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #147

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: The sentence "Hubs MUST send the results of FHIR reads in the context" is not clear.

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Event Catalog
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: The sentence "Hubs MUST send the results of FHIR reads in the context" is not clear.

Comment: The sentence "Hubs MUST send the results of FHIR reads in the context" is not clear.

I suggest to improve it.

Existing wording: "Hubs MUST send the results of FHIR reads in the context"

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #147:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

wmaethner edited a comment on Issue #147:

Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
